Reviews.Title: Not for newbies
Reviews.Author: Fulano
Reviews.Content: The product was difficult to setup.  Tech support was ok (company only has 2 employees).  BUT, the dynamic IP service was discontinued and the company has no plans to reinstate. This means you need to try and setup a dynamic DNS service with another company - good luck. Finally, and assuming you get the dynamic IP address issues resolved, the video images cannot be accessed straight over the Internet- each computer has to have Clover's net viewer software installed. THIS DOES NOT WORK WITH SMARTPHONES!

Reviews.Title: Stop working in half year
Reviews.Author: Toshiba l755-s5311
Reviews.Content: It was working for a wale, very slow over internet. eventually it stopped working in few month . I found message on a screen- No HD
